B.flavorText:

foreignData.flavorText:

—Modriss aus Zargoth Fen

foreignData.text:
Come costo addizionale per lanciare questa magia, sacrifica una creatura.

foreignData.flavorText:

foreignData.flavorText:

foreignData.flavorText:

犧牲一個生物，以作為施放此咒語的額外費用。

B.name: Bone Splinters
B.originalText:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature.
Destroy target creature.

rulings.text: You must sacrifice exactly one creature to cast this spell; you can’t cast it without sacrificing a creature, and you can’t sacrifice additional creatures.
Once you begin to cast Bone Splinters, no player may take actions until you’re done. Notably, opponents can’t try to remove the creature you wish to sacrifice.

B.text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature.
Destroy target creature.

B.flavorText: Imagine a thousand tiny mushrooms cropping up within your lungs.

foreignData.flavorText: Stelle dir vor, wie tausend winzige Pilze deine Lungen füllen.
foreignData.name: Erstickende Sporen
foreignData.text: Eine Kreatur deiner Wahl erhält -3/-3 bis zum Ende des Zuges.

foreignData.flavorText: Imagina miles de pequeños hongos creciéndote dentro de los pulmones.

foreignData.text: La criatura objetivo obtiene -3/-3 hasta el final del turno.

foreignData.flavorText: Imaginez un millier de champignons microscopiques s'installant dans vos poumons.
foreignData.name: Spores étrangleuses
foreignData.text: La créature ciblée gagne -3/-3 jusqu'à la fin du tour.

foreignData.flavorText: È come se nei tuoi polmoni spuntassero migliaia di minuscoli funghi.
foreignData.name: Spore Soffocanti
foreignData.text: Una creatura bersaglio prende -3/-3 fino alla fine del turno.

foreignData.flavorText: 千の小さなキノコが肺の中で育つのを想像してみろ。

foreignData.text: クリーチャー１体を対象とする。ターン終了時まで、それは－３/－３の修整を受ける。

foreignData.flavorText: 수천 개의 작은 버섯들이 당신의 폐를 가득 메우는 것을 상상해 봐라.
foreignData.name: 목을 죄는 포자
foreignData.text: 생물을 목표로 정한다. 그 생물은 턴종료까지 -3/-3을 받는다.

foreignData.flavorText: Imagine milhares de pequenos cogumelos brotando dentro de seus pulmões.
foreignData.name: Esporos Estrangulantes
foreignData.text: A criatura alvo recebe -3/-3 até o final do turno.

foreignData.flavorText: Представь, как тысячи крохотных грибов прорастают в твоих легких.
foreignData.name: Удушливые Споры
foreignData.text: Целевое существо получает -3/-3 до конца хода.

foreignData.flavorText: 想象一下你的肺中冒出千朵蘑菇。
foreignData.name: 窒息芽孢
foreignData.text: 目标生物得-3/-3直到回合结束。

foreignData.name: 窒息芽孢
foreignData.text: 目標生物得-3/-3直到回合結束。

B.originalText: Target creature gets -3/-3 until end of turn.
B.text: Target creature gets -3/-3 until end of turn.

B.flavorText: Many an inventor has collapsed under the pressure to create a flawless design.

foreignData.flavorText: So manche Erfinder scheitern an dem Druck, ein makelloses Konstrukt zu entwerfen.
foreignData.name: Gedankenzersetzung
foreignData.text: Ein Spieler deiner Wahl wirft zwei Karten ab.

foreignData.flavorText: Más de un inventor se ha venido abajo por la presión de crear el diseño perfecto.
foreignData.name: Podredumbre mental
foreignData.text: El jugador objetivo descarta dos cartas.

foreignData.flavorText: Plus d'un inventeur s'est fourvoyé dans la quête de la conception parfaite.
foreignData.name: Pourrissement cérébral
foreignData.text: Le joueur ciblé se défausse de deux cartes.

foreignData.flavorText: Più di un inventore è stato schiacciato dall'ossessione di creare il progetto perfetto.
foreignData.name: Cancrena della Mente
foreignData.text: Un giocatore bersaglio scarta due carte.

foreignData.flavorText: 完璧な設計を生み出すという重圧に潰された発明者は数知れない。
foreignData.name: 精神腐敗
foreignData.text: プレイヤー１人を対象とする。そのプレイヤーはカード２枚を捨てる。

foreignData.flavorText: 많은 발명가들이 완벽한 디자인을 만들려는 스트레스에 못 이겨 쓰러진다.
foreignData.name: 정신 부패
foreignData.text: 플레이어를 목표로 정한다. 그 플레이어는 카드 두 장을 버린다.

foreignData.flavorText: Muitos inventores entraram em colapso ante à pressão de criar um projeto impecável.
foreignData.name: Estiolar a Mente
foreignData.text: O jogador alvo descarta dois cards.

foreignData.flavorText: Многих изобретателей подкосило стремление создать безупречное произведение.
foreignData.name: Гниение Разума
foreignData.text: Целевой игрок сбрасывает две карты.

foreignData.flavorText: 许多发明家因创造无瑕设计的压力而崩溃。
foreignData.name: 心之衰
foreignData.text: 目标牌手弃两张牌。

foreignData.flavorText: 許多發明家因創造無瑕設計的壓力而崩潰。
foreignData.name: 心之衰
foreignData.text: 目標玩家棄兩張牌。

G.flavorText:
"And if you threaten me again, your shiny steel trousers will be sprouting daggerthorn vines."

foreignData.flavorText:

foreignData.text: Destruye el artefacto o encantamiento objetivo.

foreignData.flavorText:

foreignData.name: Naturalisation
foreignData.text: Détruisez l'artefact ciblé ou l'enchantement ciblé.

foreignData.flavorText:

foreignData.text: Distruggi un artefatto o un incantesimo bersaglio.

foreignData.flavorText:

――屋上の走り手、イヴェータ

foreignData.text: アーティファクト１つかエンチャント１つを対象とし、それを破壊する。

foreignData.flavorText:
"날 한 번만 더 위협하면 네 반짝이는 강철 바지에서 비수가시 넝쿨이 자라나게 하겠어."
—옥상 주자, 이베타
foreignData.name: 자연화
foreignData.text: 마법물체나 부여마법을 목표로 정한다. 그 목표를 파괴한다.

foreignData.flavorText:
"E se vocês me ameaçarem de novo, vão nascer vinhas espinho-de-adaga nessas suas calças de aço reluzente."

foreignData.name: Naturalizar
foreignData.text: Destrua o artefato ou encantamento alvo.

foreignData.flavorText:

— Ивета, бегущая по крышам

R.flavorText: "Unwelcome thoughts crowd my mind. Are they my own madness, or the whispers of another?" —Sarkhan Vol

Wirf als zusätzliche Kosten, um diesen Zauberspruch zu wirken, eine Karte ab.

Come costo addizionale per lanciare questa magia, scarta una carta.
Pesca due carte.

foreignData.flavorText:

――サルカン・ヴォル

이 주문을 발동하기 위한 추가비용으로, 카드 한 장을 버린다.

foreignData.flavorText:

R.name: Tormenting Voice
R.originalText:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, discard a card.
Draw two cards.

rulings.text: You must discard exactly one card to cast Tormenting Voice; you can’t cast it without discarding a card, and you can’t discard additional cards.

R.text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, discard a card.
Draw two cards.

R.flavorText: As the Cabal legions pushed into Shiv, they learned not to stand so close together.

foreignData.flavorText: Als die Legionen der Kabbalisten nach Shiv vordrangen, lernten sie auf die schmerzhafte Art, nicht zu dicht zusammenzustehen.
foreignData.name: Sprühender Blitz
foreignData.text: Der Sprühende Blitz fügt einem Spieler deiner Wahl 3 Schadenspunkte und jeder Kreatur, die er kontrolliert, 1 Schadenspunkt zu.

foreignData.flavorText: A medida que las legiones de la Cábala avanzaron por Shiv, aprendieron a no ponerse tan cerca unos de otros.
foreignData.name: Rayo propagado
foreignData.text: El Rayo propagado hace 3 puntos de daño al jugador objetivo y 1 punto de daño a cada criatura que controla ese jugador.

foreignData.flavorText: Tandis que les légions de la Coterie s'enfonçaient dans Shiv, les soldats apprirent à s'écarter les uns des autres.
foreignData.name: Foudre irradiante
foreignData.text: La Foudre irradiante inflige 3 blessures au joueur ciblé et 1 blessure à chaque créature que ce joueur contrôle.

foreignData.flavorText: Addentrandosi nella regione di Shiv, i legionari della Cabala impararono a non marciare troppo compatti.
foreignData.name: Fulmine a Dispersione
foreignData.text: Il Fulmine a Dispersione infligge 3 danni a un giocatore bersaglio e 1 danno a ogni creatura controllata da quel giocatore.

foreignData.flavorText: シヴに入り込んだ陰謀団の軍団は、互いに近寄り過ぎるとまずいことを知った。
foreignData.name: 放射稲妻
foreignData.text: プレイヤー１人を対象とする。放射稲妻はそのプレイヤーに３点と、そのプレイヤーがコントロールしている各クリーチャーにそれぞれ１点のダメージを与える。

foreignData.flavorText: 도당의 군단이 시브까지 밀어닥쳤을 때, 그들은 서로 너무 가깝게 서 있어서는 안 된다는 것을 깨닫게 되었다.
foreignData.name: 빛나는 번개
foreignData.text: 플레이어를 목표로 정한다. 빛나는 번개는 그 플레이어에게 피해 3점을 입히고 그 플레이어가 조종하는 각 생물에게 피해 1점을 입힌다.

foreignData.flavorText: Conforme as legiões da Cabala avançavam em Shiv, aprendiam a não usar formações tão compactas.
foreignData.name: Relâmpago Irradiante
foreignData.text: Relâmpago Irradiante causa 3 pontos de dano ao jogador alvo e 1 ponto de dano a cada criatura que aquele jogador controla.

foreignData.flavorText: Когда легионы Кабала вторглись в Шив, солдаты быстро научились не стоять слишком близко друг к другу.
foreignData.name: Лучистая Молния
foreignData.text: Лучистая Молния наносит 3 повреждения целевому игроку и 1 повреждение каждому существу под контролем того игрока.

foreignData.flavorText: 柯帮的万马千军一踏足西瓦，就学会了彼此不能靠太近。
foreignData.name: 放射闪电
foreignData.text: 放射闪电对目标牌手造成3点伤害，且对每个由该牌手操控的生物各造成1点伤害。

foreignData.flavorText: 柯幫的萬馬千軍一踏足西瓦，就學會了彼此不能靠太近。
foreignData.name: 放射閃電
foreignData.text: 放射閃電對目標玩家造成3點傷害，且對每個由該玩家操控的生物各造成1點傷害。

R.name: Radiating Lightning
R.originalText: Radiating Lightning deals 3 damage to target player and 1 damage to each creature that player controls.

rulings.text: Radiating Lightning targets only the player. Creatures that player controls with hexproof will be dealt damage.

R.text: Radiating Lightning deals 3 damage to target player and 1 damage to each creature that player controls.

U.flavorText: "Half of your studies will be learning the laws of magic. The other half will be bending them." —Naru Meha, master wizard

foreignData.flavorText: „In der ersten Hälfte deiner Ausbildung studierst du die Gesetze der Magie. In der zweiten Hälfte lernst du, sie in deinem Sinne zu interpretieren." —Naru Meha, die Meisterzauberin
foreignData.name: Weissagung
foreignData.text: Ziehe zwei Karten.

foreignData.flavorText: "Dedicarás la mitad de tu tiempo de estudio a aprender las reglas de la magia y la otra mitad a descubrir cómo manipularlas". —Naru Meha, maga experta
foreignData.name: Adivinación
foreignData.text: Roba dos cartas.

foreignData.flavorText: « La moitié de vos études consistera à apprendre les lois de la magie. L'autre moitié consistera à les faire plier. » —Naru Meha, maître sorcier
foreignData.name: Divination
foreignData.text: Piochez deux cartes.

foreignData.flavorText: "Metà dei vostri studi consisterà nell'apprendere le leggi della magia. L'altra metà nel piegarle." —Naru Meha, maga insegnante
foreignData.name: Divinazione
foreignData.text: Pesca due carte.

foreignData.flavorText: 「諸君の勉学の半分は魔法の法則を学ぶことに充てられる。残りの半分でそれを捻じ曲げることを学ぶ。」 ――練達の魔術師、ナル・メハ
foreignData.name: 予言
foreignData.text: カードを２枚引く。

foreignData.flavorText: "그대의 연구 중 절반은 마법의 법칙을 이해하는 것일세. 그리고 나머지 절반은 그것을 다루는 법을 배우는 것이지." —대마법사, 나루 메하
foreignData.name: 점
foreignData.text: 카드 두 장을 뽑는다.

foreignData.flavorText: "Metade de seus estudos será aprender as leis da magia. A outra metade será como dobrá-las." — Naru Meha, maga mestra
foreignData.name: Divinação

W.name: Healing Grace
W.originalText: Prevent the next 3 damage that would be dealt to any target this turn by a source of your choice. You gain 3 life.

rulings.text: Healing Grace only targets the creature, planeswalker, or player that will receive the damage prevention “shield.” The source isn’t targeted.
You choose only one source, even if that source won’t deal 3 damage.
You gain 3 life as Healing Grace resolves, even if there’s no damage to prevent.

W.name: Mighty Leap
W.originalText: Target creature gets +2/+2 and gains flying until end of turn.

rulings.text: Giving a creature flying after it’s already been blocked won’t change or undo that block. If you want to affect what can block the creature, you must cast Mighty Leap during the declare attackers step at the latest.
